actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act to add certain segments to the Rogue River designation, and for other purposes.
short_title: Lower Rogue Wild and Scenic Rivers Act of 2008

summary.text: Lower Rogue Wild and Scenic Rivers Act of 2008 - Amends the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act to add specified segments of creeks to the designation of the Rogue River in Oregon as a component of the national wild and scenic rivers system.

titles.title: Lower Rogue Wild and Scenic Rivers Act of 2008
A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act to add certain segments to the Rogue River designation, and for other purposes.
